Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: All rates include VAT but exclude city tax

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Enjoy the most stunning luxury hotel the Champs-Elysees has to offer with light fare and cocktails under a skylight.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Experience our luxury hotel's 24-hour fitness center, Internet access and a business center while you visit Champs-Elysees.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: See the Arc de Triomphe, the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum while you stay at our luxury hotel on Avenue des Champs-Elysees.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Experience our downtown Paris hotel rooms with soft comforters, cotton linens and fluffy pillows.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Feel at home with our Paris hotel's large work table, Internet access, mini-bar and flat screen TV.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Enjoy perks like deluxe marble bathrooms, bathrobes and hair dryers at our hotel in downtown Paris.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Relax in your hotel room with 24-hour room service; most rooms have views of the Champs-Elysees.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Delight in our suite hotel's downtown Paris location, minutes from boutiques and area attractions.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Absorb the breathtaking views of the lovely Champs-Elysees from your hotel suite in Paris.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Experience our downtown Paris hotel rooms with soft comforters, cotton linens and fluffy pillows.
Feel at home with our Paris hotel's large work table, Internet access, mini-bar and flat screen TV.
Enjoy perks like deluxe marble bathrooms, bathrobes and hair dryers at our hotel in downtown Paris.

Delight in our suite hotel's downtown Paris location, minutes from boutiques and area attractions.
Absorb the breathtaking views of the lovely Champs-Elysees from your hotel suite in Paris.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Explore downtown Paris' dining and attractions, just steps away from our luxury, business hotel.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Enjoy more than 6,000 square feet of facilities and nine banqueting spaces for your business event.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Choose our hotel catering for breakfast, lunch, dinner, receptions and more at your Paris function.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Utilize our onsite business center with copy and fax services when you stay at our hotel.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Use our elegant Grand Ballroom to seat up to 300 guests at your downtown business function in Paris.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Reserve a group accommodation at our Paris business hotel before your next downtown conference.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Enjoy top attractions just minutes from our upscale hotel suites in Paris on the Champs-Elysees.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Stroll around Arc de Triomphe and the Eiffel Tower, just steps away from our upscale hotel in Paris.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Visit the nearby Louvre Museum, Chateau de Versailles and Disneyland Paris while at our hotel.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Discover the world famous cabaret Le Lido conveniently located only steps away from the hotel.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Designers shops are only steps away from the Hotel, as well as all the biggest worldwide brands

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Enjoy a convenient access to Paris Airports: Roissy Charles de Gaulle (CDG) and Orly (ORY)

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Choose from our stylish, unique wedding venues in Paris, France and make your dreams come true.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Turn to our experienced event planners to pick the perfect wedding venues for your special day.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Select the Grand Ballroom, our largest luxury wedding venue in Paris, for your lovely function.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Design custom event menus, including the best kosher catering in Paris, for your luxury wedding.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Tour the outdoor terraces for a refreshing, wedding venue at your special day in Paris, France.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Include high-speed Internet and advanced A/V equipment to enhance your wedding weekend.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The elegant Paris Marriott Champs Elysees Hotel, the only 5-star hotel on this world famous avenue, is a stunning luxury hotel in downtown Paris and the perfect base from which to explore and enjoy everything this extraordinary city has to offer.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Experience the Paris Marriott Hotel Champs-Elysees. It's the only 5-star hotel in Paris located on the Champs-Elysees for your convenience. This luxury, five star hotel on the Champs-Elysees is the perfect base to explore everything this extraordinary city has to offer. With 192 lovely guest rooms and suites, an incredible restaurant, reflecting the very best of French cuisine, and an exceptional seven-story lobby with a movable glass-domed roof, youâ€™ll have treasured memories of your visit. Our Champs-Elysees, five star hotel is minutes from some of the city's most elegant boutiques such as Christian Dior, Louis Vuitton and Valentino and classic attractions, including Arc de Triomphe, Louvre Museum and the Eiffel Tower, perched on the banks of the River Seine. Warm and welcoming service coupled with fantastic amenities make us one of the finest 5 star hotels on the Champs-Elysees in Paris. For your next Parisian trip, be sure to book a luxurious suite at the five star, Paris Marriott Hotel Champs-Elysees.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Located on the Champs-Elysees, this 5-star, luxury downtown Paris hotel is just steps from major city attractions such as Arc de Triomphe, Eiffel Tower, Louvre and Orsay museums. The hotel is also ideal to shop in the major luxury Paris department stores.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Experience an outstanding restaurant on the Champs-Elysees. This casually elegant establishment treats you to exquisitely prepared French cuisine seasoned with worldwide flavours by our Chef, Jeremy Touzelet. We invite you to try our many menu options.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Relax at our delightful restaurant with a terrace in downtown Paris. Heated in the winter and sheltered in the summer, this popular restaurant on the Champs-Elysees offers an exclusive and beautiful setting to unwind and enjoy a great meal or a cocktail.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Visit this terrific restaurant on the Champs-Elysees. The Lobby Bar Atrium boasts a stunning skylight. It's the perfect spot to end a busy day with a flute of champagne and a bar snack, still served past midnight. Bring family and friends for fun times.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Indulge yourself at our restaurant on the Champs-Elysees. With our ideal location, it's very easy to find us in downtown Paris. You'll always enjoy our savory fare, cocktails or sweets. Stop by our charming restaurant for delicious, international cuisine.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy all-day dining with Indonesian cuisine, along with the French expertise, at Makassar Restaurant & Lounge.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: 2* Michelin French Chef Alain Dutournier created the Pinxo as a casual alternative to his famous restaurant CarrÃ© des Feuillants. All dishes are beautifully served in 3 portions that guests may share in an contemporary environment in the heart of Paris.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The Restaurant offers a simple and tasty cuisine that will remind you of delicious family meals and convivial moments shared with friends. The garden is the best place to have a peaceful lunch or a moonlit dinner. Closed on Saturday for lunch and Sunday.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy the fine cuisine of the Pourcel brothers on the rooftops of Paris.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Art Deco style restaurant where you'll savor a wide choice of classic dishes.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: You will be able to sip breath-taking cocktails in a cozy bar, under the look of a gigantic Buddha statue.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located the Eiffel Tower's 2nd floor with a panoramic view of Paris, France. Chef Alain Ducasse cuisine.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A brasserie offering a selection of oysters and seafood, with a piano bar.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: This is famous Chef Guy Savoy's main restaurant in Paris, France, offering refined French cuisine.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Renowned throughout the city, this restaurant welcomes patrons to an elegant, intimate setting, perfect for an unforgettable dining experience. The 16Haussmann delights guests with refined French cuisine and international dishes.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Gastronomic French cuisine honoured with 2 stars and featuring outstanding service.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: One of Paris' most historic restaurants, the Procope has a decor largely inspired by the great Parisian events that took place there.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: One of the most famous Parisian brasseries, the seafood platters are exquisite.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Classical French cuisine served with an impressive wine menu to accompany your meal in Paris, France.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Seafood restaurant specializing in offering a wide selection of fresh oysters.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A traditional brasserie restaurant serving French cuisine and seafood specialties.

Restaurant.RestaurantName: Oleo Pazzo Meditteranean Bistro at Courtyard Paris Arcueil

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The Mediterranean restaurant serves traditional mediterranean cuisine with a touch of French in a casual and upscale atmosphere. Restaurant closed on weekends. For your convenience, the Market offers sandwiches, salads and soups at all times.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The "R'Yves" Great Room is a 70s inspired area combining a European Brasserie, a cocktail bar and lounge as well as a take-away counter. The design is chic and trendy and the atmosphere is casual.

Restaurant.RestaurantName: Oleo Pazzo Bistro at Courtyard Paris Saint Denis

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy fresh and healthy Mediterranean cuisine in a warm and casual atmosphere

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Typical parisian brasserie with a friendly and bright atmosphere. Free WIFI and outdoor terrace, in the heart of Paris La DÃ©fense, France.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Discover French and international cuisine at our restaurant near Paris CDG Airport, â€œLe 5â€. Should it be for a relaxing break at the bar or at the restaurant, the guest has a wide choice of dishes, speed of service and atmosphere.

Restaurant.RestaurantName: Oleo Pazzo Bar & Restaurant at Courtyard Defense West - Colombes

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Casual bistro offering home style cooking of Mediterranean dishes with a large and calm outdoor garden terrace.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: To drive from Paris CDG International Airport to the Paris Marriott Hotel Champs Elysees, take highway A1 in the direction of Paris. Stay on the highway A1 until you reach the ring road surrounding Paris, called the "Peripherique". Follow the direction "Peripherique Exterieur" and exit at "Porte Maillot". Follow the directions to "Charles de Gaulle- Etoile". Drive towards the Arc de Triomphe monument and get onto the roundabout surrounding it. Take the "Avenue des Champs Elysees" exit and drive straight down to arrive at the Paris Marriott Hotel Champs Elysees. Five blocks down from the Arc de Triomphe, the entrance to the hotel's underground garage is in front of a shop called "Monoprix". Once you see this shop you should make a U-turn to enter the garage so you can park your car.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take A6 Highway direction Paris.Enter into Paris.Take the avenue de La Porte d'OrlÃ©ans. Continue on the avenue du General Leclerc. Continue on the Avenue du Maine [1.4km] and then the Rue du DÃ©part (380m) Turn left on the Boulevard du Montparnasse (670m). Continue on the Boulevard des Invalides (470m). Continue on the Avenue de Villars (290m) and then the Place Vauban [54m]. Turn left on the Avenue de Tourville (230m). Turn right on the Boulevard de la Tour-Maubourg (360m). Continue on the Pont des Invalides (220m). Continue on the Avenue Franklin D. Roosevelt (460m). Turn left on the Avenue des Champs-Elysees (490m). The entrance to the hotel's undeground garage is in front of a shop called "Monoprix". Once you see this shop you should make a U-turn to enter the garage so that you can park your car.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Where better then on the Champs Elysees could you possibly host your next event in Paris? With 9 meeting rooms including a magnificent Ballroom, the Paris Marriott Champs ElysÃ©es is the ideal place to organize meetings, seminars, incentives or luxury weddings! Try out or professional event team!

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Earn Marriott Reward Points on your event

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Marriott Rewarding Events offers its members the opportunity to earn points for every confirmed meeting or event held at a participating hotel. You can choose between earning points toward hotel stays worldwide and other great rewards or earning miles in your favorite frequent flyer program.

Description.Name: Message Text

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Free fitness gym in downtown Paris

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: While staying at the Paris Marriott Champs ElysÃ©es, make sure to take advantage of the free fitness gym reserved to our guests. Towels and water are at your disposal directly in the fitness.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Easy Access from Paris CDG Airport

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: The Marriott Champs Elysees is easily accessible from Paris CDG Airport. Several options are here for you: You may choose to take a cab, or to take the Air France buses, or the local train, or even rent a car and drive towards the hotel. For any of these options, please feel free to contact us.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Peruse the latest Paris vacation packages from the Marriott. Perfect for romantic getaways & family vacations, be sure to check back often as our vacation packages in Paris change throughout the year.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Downtown Paris Suites at Champs Elysees Hotel

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: The Paris Marriott Hotel Champs ElysÃ©es offers 192 luxury guest rooms and suites directly located on the most famous avenue of Paris: The Champs ElysÃ©es. Enjoy splendid hotel suites in downtown Paris for your next trip to Paris. Discover all our Suites, including some with view on Champs ElysÃ©es

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Notice of temporary closure from February, 15th

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: We kindly inform our clientele that the restaurant will be closed from February 15th until March 18th.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Come and try out this season gourmet menu

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Our Chef is pleased to invite you to discover his new Ã la carte menu. Jeremy Touzelet offers a refined cuisine with the best produce, guaranteeing a new culinary experience, every time. For this winter, the Chef warms up our plates by offering an elaborate and sunny Mediterranean cuisine.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Book Air + Hotel and Get up to 35% Savings!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Save up to 35% when you book an air+hotel package from Vacations by Marriott â€“ and still receive your Marriott Reward points! Enjoy Paris, the City of Love with our great holiday packages!

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: A unique location : only 5-stars hotel located on the famous Champs-Elysees avenueParisian architecture with a frontage registered on the second list of historical monumentsEasy access to the Porte Maillot Convention Center (metro line 1 ; 5 stops; 10 min) and La Defense business district (metro line 1 ; 8 stops; 16 min)Spacious bedrooms : from 30-35sqm for the standard room (so called Deluxe room) with both bath tub and shower in most of our bathroomsAn entire floor fully dedicated to your meeting comprising a Ballroom of 325sqm with a 100sqm-foyer. Five breakout rooms including three with natural daylights.Possibility to get the exclusive use of our restaurant for special event. Our terrace, an authentic winter garden in the heart of the Champs-Elysees, is the perfect place to host a group dinner in a peaceful and serene atmosphere.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: * Catering only: catering only business targeted throughout the year. Our meeting spaces can be sold without any accommodation needs. Rate Flexibility. Ideal meeting size : 10-150 guests. Wedding : up to 220 guests.Ideal target : training companies with regular catering needs.Kosher Business targeted //// * Group Corp :Solid group corporate base required on the following months : October, November, December, January, February, March, April.Rate flexibility depending on volume /Ideal group size : 10-25 bedrooms. Rates from 329â‚¬.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
